paragraph: After the Mauryas, new rulers like the Guptas and the Cholas rose to power. Later, powerful rulers like Raja Raja Chola built strong armies, grand temples, and expanded their empire overseas.

Early life
The story of Chandragupta's early life and rise to power is of great interest. According to Buddhist traditions, Chandragupta's father was the chief of Pippalivana, lying between the modern Terai region in Nepal and Gorakhpur, UP. He was defeated and killed in a battle with the ruler of the neighbouring kingdom. This had reduced Chandragupta's mother to a state of poverty. She was compelled to seek
